node.name: lc - return lower-case version of a string
node.description:
Returns an lowercased version of EXPR. This is the internal function implementing the \L escape in double-quoted strings. Respects current LC_CTYPE locale if use locale in force. See [perlman:perllocale|the perllocale manpage].

If EXPR is omitted, uses $_.
node.title: perlfunc:lc
